TF090994-RAPID CAPACITY BUILDING OF CDD
            IN WBGAZA,TF092174-VILLAGE AND NEIGHBORHOOD
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Village and
            Neighborhood Development Project for West Bank and Gaza is
            to promote a coordinated development approach which builds
            the capacity of communities to plan for and manage
            resources. The changes are to: (i) refine selected Project
            Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable better
            measurement of the achievement of the Project Development
            Objective (PDO); (ii) extend the closing date from April 30,
            2012 to October 31, 2013, to allow for completion of all
            project activities, following protracted delays in project
            start-up and initial implementation; (iii) reallocate the
            Trust Fund Grant Agreement (TFGA) proceeds to ensure
            adequate financing for project implementation and oversight
            activities following the project's extension. The
            modifications constitute a level-two restructuring.
